headline.print_headline: ‘19 Kids and Counting’ Is Removed From TLC
headline.main: TLC Pulls ‘19 Kids and Counting’ From Its Lineup

snippet: The show was removed following allegations that one of the show’s stars, Josh Duggar, had previously been investigated for molesting several minors.
abstract: The show was removed following allegations that one of the show’s stars, Josh Duggar, had previously been investigated for molesting several minors.
